title: Total War:Rome II - Hannibal at the Gates Campaign Pack - Offical Trallers(中英双字)

json.text: [HAN] 大汉军团 翻译
人员： [HAN]Napolean, [HAN]Etamin, [HAN]waNgamer
Hannibal my son 汉尼拔， 我的儿子
stand before the gods and sware 在诸神面前发誓
from this day until your last 从这一天到最后一天
and you will always be an enemy of Rome 你永远是罗马的敌人
you insult Rome 你冒犯了罗马
you have violated the treaty that bans you 你破坏了限制你的条约
I will remind you 我要提醒你
The last time Carthage resisted Rome 上一次迦太基反抗罗马的时候
The last time Carthage resisted Rome 上一次迦太基反抗罗马的时候
your fathers were burried in the fields of Sicily 你们的父辈们埋葬在了西西里的战场
Those didn't grave in dirt with opened arms 对于那些没有举着手被埋在泥里的
we sent our classem 我们派遣了海军
in the water of the Carthage 到迦太基近海
The mauretanian is undoubtly ours,  not yours 马里塔尼亚毫无疑问是我们， 不是你们的
*you give us whatever scratch that you held 你激怒了我们
*when you and your mercenaries scourged XXXric fishing villige 当你和你的佣兵劫掠了属于我们的渔村
and I have been sent here to ask you  而我被派到这里来问你
to decide between peace and open confict as if you truelly have a choice 和平还是公开对抗罗马， 就像你真的可以选择
I choose war 我选择战争
